title: Lovers Phantom
alternative_title: ラヴァーズファントム ; ラヴァーズ・ファントム
status: ラヴァーズファントム ; ラヴァーズ・ファントム
description:
Description :
        20 year old Tamonashi Kensuke is hired as a live-in employee for a one week period. His main job is to make sure he makes enough food for his employer's nephew who is the only other person who lives there, but that may not be his only purpose.
